subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mark Buehrle took a shutout into the eighth inning, and the Chicago White Sox handed Jon Lester his first loss in two and a half months, hanging on to beat the visiting Boston Red Sox, 5-3.
snippet: Mark Buehrle took a shutout into the eighth inning, and the Chicago White Sox handed Jon Lester his first loss in two and a half months, hanging on to beat the visiting Boston Red Sox, 5-3.
